name: Ocean acidification
description: Ocean acidification pressure scaled using biological thresholds

name: Sea surface temperature
description: The difference in the annual mean sea surface temperature for Hawaii eez waters compared to the 20th century mean sea surface temperature.

name: Sea surface temperature
description: Mean degree heating weeks (DHW) for nearshore areas (wihting 10 km of the coastlint), with coral bleaching expected after 4 DHW.  Scores of 1 indicate that coral bleaching is expected or occured.

name: UV radiation pressure
description: Modeled UV radiation based on Erythemal UV Irradiance data provided by GES DISC.

name: High bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: NOAA bycatch ratio from tuna fishery

name: Low bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: NOAA bycatch ratio from swordfish fishery

name: Intertidal habitat destruction
description: Coastal population density (25 mi from shore)  as a proxy for intertidal habitat destruction. Calculated as resident population per km of shoreline and standardized by maximum regional score.

name: Weakness of social progress
description: Inverse of Social Progress Index scores

name: Weakness of governance
description: Inverse of World Governance Indicators (WGI) six combined scores

name: Coastal protection weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by habitat protection rank for: reef, wetland, and beach habitats

name: Habitat weights
description: List of habitats in each region

name: Artisanal fisheries management effectiveness and opportunity
description: The opportunity for artisanal and recreational fishing based on the quality of management of the small-scale fishing sector

name: Commercial fishing management
description: Regulations and management of commerical fishing

name: CITES signatories
description: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES) signatories

name: Sector evenness as a measure of economic diversity
description: Shannon's Diversity Index calculated sector evenness based on the total number of sectors and the proportion of jobs belonging to any sector

name: Social Progress Index
description: Social Progress Index scores

name: Management of nonindigenous species
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biologicial Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: invasive species related questions

name: Measure of coastal ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (same calculation and data as the species subgoal status score)  calculated within 3 nm of shoreline as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Measure of ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (species subgoal status score) as a proxy for ecological integrity

units: ratio of waterhsed partnership land to historical extent
name: Regulatory and social conservation area
description: Ratio of waterhsed partnership land to historical extent

name: Strength of governance
description: World Governance Indicators (WGI) six combined scores

name: Region areas based on EEZ boundaries
description: Area of Ocean Health Index regions modified from exclusive economic zones

name: Shoreline accessability based on slope, available roads, and fishing closure areas
description: Shoreline accessability based on slope, available roads, and fishing closure areas

name: Participation rate in any ocean activity at least once per month
description: Participation rate in any ocean activity at least once per month

name: Habitat health: coral reefs, wetlands, beaches
description: Condition of habitats specific tohabitat

name: Habitat extent
description: Area of coastal protection habitats: reef, wetlands, beaches

name: Percent change per year in habitat extent
description: Percent change per year in habitat extent

name: Coastal pelagic commercial catch
description: Coastal pelagic (akule, opelu, jacks, ulua) commercial catch

name: Bottom commercial catch
description: Bottom fish catch from DAR data

name: Pelagic commercial catch
description: DAR catch DAR data

name: Reef commerical catch
description: DAR reef catch data

name: Recreational catch multiplier for commercial catch of nearshore fish
description: Recreational catch multiplier for commercial catch of nearshore fish

name: Stock assessment
description: Stock status from formal stock assessments, indicator of stock status differs between pelagic stocks, bottom fish, and reef fish

name: Equal weigthing for FIS and MAR
description: Equal weigthing for FIS and MAR

name: Habitat extent
description: Area of habitat

name: Habitat health
description: Current condition of habitat relative to historical condition and or estimated habitat health if historical condition unknown

name: Habitat trend
description: Estimated change in habitat condition during most recent 5 years

name: GDP
description: Gross Domestic Product (GDP)

name: numebr of jobs per sector
description: Number of jobs per sector per county

name: Total resident population
description: Resident population of OHI regions

name: Unemployment
description: DBEDT data for unemployment per county

name: Wages
description: Sector wages

name: workforce size
description: DBEDT data (includes unemployed)

name: average annual wage
description: average annual wage

name: Area within 1 km of the shore
description: Area within 1 km of the shore

name: Offshore area to 3nm
description: Offshore area to 3nm

name: Coastal conservation lands
description: Coastal conservation lands

name: State 30by30 marine managed areas
description: State 30by30 marine managed areas

name: Offshore coastal protected areas
description: Ratio of protected area to total coastal area to 3nm

name: Offshore area protected to 3nm
description: Offshore area protected to 3nm

name: Current extent of fishponds in Hawaii
Ratio of active fishponds to historical number
description: Ratio of active fishponds to historical number

name: Number of current fishponds in Hawaii
description: Number of current fishponds in Hawaii

name: Mariculture production
description: Production of shellfish and foodfish from mariculture facilities

name: Mariculture operations
description: The number of mariculture operations by type and county.

name: Sea level rise
description: The pressure on coastlines from a 3.2 ft near future sea level rise prediction.

name: Sea level rise economic loss
description: The proportion of economic loss from a 3.2 ft near future sea level rise prediction.

name: Sea surface temperature anomolies
description: The maximum observed DHW (Degree Heating Week) per pixel was calculated over the time frame of the data (2013-2016). Pixels exceeding 12 DHW were set to the maximum value since it is likely that major coral mortality has occurred those areas.

name: Percent of forest dominated by non-native species
description: Percent of forest dominated by non-native species

name: Aquarium fishing
description: Aquarium fishing take is reported to DAR separately from food fish, under a different licensing scheme and reporting system.

name: Reef fishing catch
description: Modeled reef fish catch from commerical and recreational fishery taking into account shoreline accessability.

name: Habitat destruction of benthic structures
description: Benthic structures were defined as manmade features in the offshore environment that disrupt benthic habitat and include moored buoys, channel markers, offshore cables and pipelines.

name: Habitat destruction caused by coastal engineering
description: Coastal engineering consisted of shoreline armoring structures (e.g., seawalls, revetments, groins, break waters), artificial land (i.e., land fill), and piers.

name: Habitat destruction from dredging
description: Dredging was defined as activity involving physically removing substrate with machinery typically to allow for safe passage of vessels

name: Ship-based groundings
description: To represent the risk of ship groundings and wrecks the footprint of this ship traffic layer was clipped to 9 m depth.

name: Direct impacts from humans (trampling, recreation, etc)
description: InVEST recreation model was run statewide at 1 km resolution for the years 2005 ? 2014. This model uses publicly visible geotagged photos posted to the photo-sharing website Flickr to calculate the annual average number of photo users per day per grid cell

name: Landbased source of pollution pathogens
description: Onsite waste disposal systems (ODSD) as proxy of nitrogen flux to the nearshore water.

name: Land-based sediment export to nearshore water
description: Falinski (2016) customized, parameterized, calibrated, and ran the Integrated Valuation of Ecosystem Services and Tradeoffs (InVEST) model for sediment delivery for each of the eight Main Hawaiian Islands. This model predicts the average annual amount of sediment (tons/yr) exported from each map pixel as a function of land use/land cover, soil characteristics, rainfall, slope, geology, and hydrology.

name: Land-based source of pollution from aggriculture and golf courses
description: Proxy for agricultural and landscaping runoff (nutrients from fertilizers; chemicals like pesticides and herbicides), calculated as the area of agricultural land and golf courses by watershed

name: Land-based source of pollution from urban runoff
description: Proxy for nutrient and chemical pollution

name: Marine debris
description: State of Hawaii Division of Aquatic Resources aerial imagery of marine debris from 2015.

name: Ship-based pollution
description: Ship traffic layer was used as a proxy for ship-based pollution.

name: Terrestrial aquaculture
description: Footprint of terrestial aquaculture facilities.

name: Invasive species (algae and mangroves)
description: Represents presence-only of invasive algae species in nearshore waters and mangroves along the shoreline.

name: Direct impacts from visitors on nearshore habitats and species
description: Intensity (# compared to state regional maximum) of visitors participating in surfing and board sports

name: Direct impacts from visitors on nearshore habitats and species
description: Intensity (# compared to state regional maximum) of visitors participating in kayaking and canoeing

name: Direct impacts from visitors on nearshore habitats and species
description: Intensity (# compared to state regional maximum) of visitors participating in snorkeling and scuba diving

name: Direct impacts from visitors on nearshore habitats and species
description: Intensity (# compared to state regional maximum) of visitors participating in swimming and beaching activities

name: Direct impacts from visitors on nearshore habitats and species
description: Intensity (# compared to state regional maximum) of visitors participating in thrill craft activities

name: Direct impacts from visitors on nearshore habitats and species
description: Intensity (# compared to state regional maximum) of visitors participating in whale watching

name: Number of potential CBSFA communities and active fishponds
description: Number of potential CBSFA communities and active fishponds  scaled to max number

name: Ratio of managed areas to nearshore area within 3nm of coastline
description: Ratio of managed areas to nearshore area within 3nm of coastline

name: Protected area within the EEZ
description: Ratio of protected to unprotected EEZ area. Includes restricted bottom fishing areas, longline prohibited areas, and monument areas.

name: Ratio of managed areas to nearshore area within 3nm of coastline
description: Ratio of managed areas to nearshore area within 3nm of coastline

name: Protected area within the EEZ
description: Ratio of protected to unprotected EEZ area. Includes restricted bottom fishing areas, longline prohibited areas, and monument areas.

name: Percent of priority watersheds fenced
description: Percent of priority watersheds fenced

name: State New Economy Index
description: The State New Economy Index uses 25 indicators to measure the extent to which state economies are knowledge-based, globalized, entrepreneurial, IT-driven, and innovation-oriented.

name: Status for HAB
description: Status for HAB

name: Mo'omeheu - Value of History and Culture (OHA Dashboard)
description: Mo'omeheu - Value of History and Culture (OHA Dashboard)

name: The percent of visitors that report having an excellent experience.
description: The percent of visitors that report having an excellent experience.

name: UN geopolitical region classifications
description: Lookup table of Ocean Health Index regions and UN geopolitical regions (3 levels), often used for gapfilling missing data

name: OHI regions
description: Subset of regions that are not deleted or disputed

name: Regions
description: Regions by type (eez, subocean, unclaimed)

name: Score of fish biomass in relationship to pristine fish biomass
description: Score of fish biomass in relationship to pristine fish biomass

name: Species condition based on ESA status
description: Species condition based on ESA status for marine mammals, turtles, marine birds, and coastal plants

name: Percent of effectively managed nearshore areas
description: This estimate comes from the state 30% effectively managed marine areas by 2030

name: estimated county gdp
description: The estimated visitor contribution to county gdp

name: Resident Sentiment
description: The average of three HTA questions on resident sentiment of tourism.
